item.title: 加拿大央行可能将基准借贷成本降低 50 个基点
item.description: 经济学家们表示，加拿大央行很可能在周三将其关键政策利率下调 50 个基点，因为近期有关通胀、经济增长和失业率的一系列数据要求更快地缓解消费者和企业的压力。【原文：The Bank of Canada is likely to cut its key policy rate by 50 basis points on Wednesday, as a slew of recent data on inflation, growth and unemployment calls for faster relief for consumers and businesses, economists said.】

item.title: 债券收益率上升，期货下跌；波音和可口可乐业绩值得期待
item.description: 美国股指期货周三下滑，原因是市场怀疑美联储将不再那么鸽派，这抬高了国债收益率，而投资者则在等待波音、可口可乐和特斯拉等公司的财报，以评估经济状况。【原文：U.S. stock index futures slipped on Wednesday as doubts of a less dovish Federal Reserve lifted Treasury yields, while investors awaited earnings reports from companies such as Boeing, Coca-Cola and Tesla to assess the state of the economy.】

item.title: 据《日经新闻》报道，特斯拉将通过 Yamada 连锁店在日本销售家用电池
item.description: 据《日经商业日报》周三报道，特斯拉将开始通过连锁电子商店 Yamada Denki 在日本销售其 Powerwall 家用电池系统。【原文：Tesla will start selling its Powerwall home battery system in Japan through electronics store chain Yamada Denki, the Nikkei business daily reported on Wednesday.】

item.title: 英伟达首席执行官：欧盟在人工智能投资方面落后于美国和中国
item.description: 人工智能芯片制造商英伟达公司（Nvidia）首席执行官周三表示，欧盟在人工智能投资方面远远落后于美国和中国。【原文：The European Union lags far behind the United States and China in investing in artificial intelligence, the CEO of AI chipmaker Nvidia said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 意大利 ABI 负责人称欧洲央行在并购问题上的干预对银行业联盟是致命的
item.description: 意大利银行业协会 ABI 负责人周三呼吁欧洲中央银行成为该行业交易的唯一决策者，并称为阻止一项交易而干预其独立性将是一个错误。【原文：The head of Italy's banking association ABI on Wednesday called for the European Central Bank to be the sole decision-maker over transactions in the industry, saying interfering with its independence to block one deal would be a mistake.】

item.title: 麦当劳股价下跌，因为美国有 1 人死于与 Quarter Pounder 有关的大肠杆菌疫情
item.description: 麦当劳连锁餐厅 Quarter Pounder 汉堡包引发大肠杆菌疫情，导致美国 1 人死亡、49 人染病，麦当劳股价在周三盘前交易中下跌近 6%。【原文：Shares of McDonald's fell nearly 6% in premarket trading on Wednesday after an E. coli outbreak linked to the restaurant chain's Quarter Pounder hamburgers resulted in the death of one person and sickened 49 people in the U.S.】

item.title: 调查发现，美国医疗补助计划称成本是减肥药物保险的关键因素
item.description: 据健康研究公司 KFF 的一项调查显示，美国大多数州目前都没有将诺和诺德（Novo Nordisk）和礼来（Eli Lilly）备受追捧的减肥药纳入针对低收入人群的医疗补助（Medicaid）健康项目，理由是成本是一个关键因素。【原文：Most U.S. states do not currently cover highly sought after weight-loss drugs from Novo Nordisk and Eli Lilly in their Medicaid health programs for low income people, citing cost as a key factor, according to a survey conducted by health research firm KFF.】

item.title: 罗氏公开反对清仓收购药品制造商康泰伦特
item.description: 制药巨头罗氏公司首席执行官以损害业界同行利益为由，敦促当局阻止诺和诺德公司的控股股东收购合同药品生产商康泰伦特公司。【原文：The CEO of pharmaceuticals giant Roche has urged authorities to block the takeover of contract drug manufacturer Catalent by Novo Nordisk's controlling shareholder, citing harm to industry peers.】

item.title: 越南计划向越南商业银行注资以支持政策目标
item.description: 越南副总理周三表示，越南正计划向国有商业银行越南商业银行（Vietcombank）注资 20.695 万亿（8.15 亿美元）。 越南副总理周三表示，越南正计划向越南最大的国有商业银行越南商业银行（Vietcombank）注资 20.695 万亿美元（约合 8.15 亿美元），以增强其支持政府政策的能力。【原文：Vietnam is planning to inject 20.695 trillion ($815 million) of capital into state-owned commercial lender Vietcombank , the country's biggest bank, to boost its capacity to support government policy, the deputy prime minister said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 报道称小米汽车工厂扩建将于 2025 年中期完成
item.description: 据中国政府支持的媒体周三报道，中国智能手机制造商小米公司预计将于 2025 年中期完成其电动汽车工厂的扩建工程。【原文：Chinese smartphone maker Xiaomi Corp is expected to complete the construction of an expansion of its electric vehicle factory in mid-2025, according to government-backed Chinese media on Wednesday】

item.title: 欧莱雅第三季度销售额不及预期，股价下跌
item.description: 法国化妆品巨头欧莱雅第三季度销售数据不及预期，中国消费者信心低迷削弱了对美容产品的需求，欧莱雅股价周三下滑。【原文：L'Oreal's shares slid lower on Wednesday after third quarter sales figures from the French cosmetics giant missed expectations, as low consumer confidence in China sapped demand for beauty products.】

item.title: 在阿根廷的瓦卡穆埃尔塔页岩地区，"钻井，宝贝，钻井"！
item.description: 阿根廷对市场友好的新政府以及对中东和其他地区石油供应的担忧正在推动阿根廷巴塔哥尼亚南部的钻探和生产热潮，这里是巨大的瓦卡穆埃尔塔页岩层（西班牙语 "死牛 "的意思）的所在地。【原文：Argentina's new market-friendly government and fears about oil supply from the Middle East and elsewhere are driving a drilling and production boom in Argentina's Patagonian south, home to the giant Vaca Muerta shale formation, Spanish for "Dead Cow".】

item.title: 日本电产第二季度营业利润增长 10
item.description: 日本电机制造商日本电产周三公布的季度营业利润增长了 10%，达到 607 亿日元（3.9879 亿美元），去年同期为 551 亿日元。【原文：Japanese electric motor maker Nidec posted a 10% rise in quarterly operating profit on Wednesday to 60.7 billion yen ($398.79 million), compared to 55.1 billion yen in the same period a year earlier.】

item.title: 聚焦美国和英国，伊比利亚-德拉公司利润跃升 50
item.description: 欧洲最大的公用事业公司伊贝尔德罗拉公司（Iberdrola）周三公布，今年前九个月的净利润增长了 50%，这表明该公司对英国和美国的重视正在取得成效。【原文：Europe's largest utility Iberdrola posted on Wednesday a 50% increase in net profit for the first nine months of the year, in a sign that its focus on Britain and the United States is paying off.】

item.title: 劳埃德银行第三季度利润超预期，信心增强，房价上涨
item.description: 劳埃德银行集团（Lloyds Banking Group）周三公布的第三季度利润超出预期，并重申了 2024 年的业绩指导，理由是客户的金融信心不断增强。【原文：Lloyds Banking Group reported third quarter profits that exceeded expectations on Wednesday, and reaffirmed its performance guidance for 2024, citing increasing financial confidence among its customers.】

item.title: 医疗保健帮助利洁时超越季度销售预期
item.description: Reckitt 周三公布的第三季度基本销售额降幅小于预期，这主要得益于其健康业务，该业务主要生产 Nurofen 止痛药和 Strepsils 润喉糖。【原文：Reckitt reported a smaller than expected fall in third-quarter underlying sales on Wednesday, helped by its health business, which makes Nurofen painkillers and Strepsils lozenges.】

item.title: 喜力啤酒季度收入略超预期
item.description: 荷兰啤酒制造商喜力周三公布的第三季度销售数据超出预期，这主要得益于高价啤酒和非酒精啤酒的提振，但喜力的全年业绩指导保持不变。【原文：Dutch brewer Heineken's third-quarter sales figures beat forecasts on Wednesday, buoyed by higher priced and non-alcoholic beers, but full-year guidance was left unchanged.】

item.title: 广告集团 WPP 第三季度有机收入增长 0.5
item.description: 英国广告集团 WPP 公布，第三季度同类有机业务收入增长 0.5%，好于预期，其中北美、西欧大陆和印度的增长被中国持续的艰难交易部分抵消。【原文：British ad group WPP reported a better-than-expected 0.5% rise in like-for-like organic revenue in the third quarter, with growth in North America, western continental Europe and India partly offset by continued tough trading in China.】

item.title: 罗氏第三季度销售额增长 9%，超出市场预期
item.description: 由于每月一次的血友病药物 Hemlibra 和最近推出的眼科药物 Vabysmo 的处方量增加，罗氏公司第三季度的销售额经货币调整后增长了 9%，超过了市场预期。【原文：Roche's third-quarter sales gained a currency-adjusted 9%, beating market expectations, on higher prescriptions of once-monthly haemophilia shot Hemlibra and recently launched eye drug Vabysmo.】

item.title: 随着石油龙头的打开，2025 年沙特阿拉伯经济增长将加速
item.description: 路透社对经济学家进行的一项调查显示，在经历了两年的温和增长之后，由于石油产量的增加，沙特阿拉伯明年的经济增长将加速。【原文：Economic growth in Saudi Arabia will accelerate next year thanks to higher oil output after two years of modest performance, according to a Reuters poll of economists, who also forecast robust growth for other Gulf Cooperation Council (GCC) states.】

item.title: 市场放缓，沃尔沃汽车下调全年增长预期
item.description: 总部位于瑞典的沃尔沃汽车公司（Volvo Cars）周三公布第三季度营业利润增长，但在市场加速疲软的情况下下调了全年销售增长预期。【原文：Sweden-based Volvo Cars reported a rise in third-quarter operating profit on Wednesday but cut its full-year sales growth forecast amid accelerating market weakness.】

item.title: 德意志银行第三季度恢复盈利
item.description: 德意志银行第三季度扭亏为盈，原因是该行释放了为投资者就其邮政银行部门提起的诉讼而预留的准备金，而且其全球投资银行也火力全开。【原文：Deutsche Bank bounced back to profit in the third quarter, as it released reserves set aside for investor lawsuits over its Postbank division and as its global investment bank fired on all cylinders.】

item.title: 早间竞价：大选和美联储引发市场恐慌
item.description: 安库尔-班纳吉（Ankur Banerjee）对欧洲和全球市场未来一天的展望【原文：A look at the day ahead in European and global markets from Ankur Banerjee】

item.title: 消息人士称，欧洲央行开始讨论利率是否必须低于中性水平
item.description: 本周与六位消息人士的谈话显示，欧洲中央银行的政策制定者们已经开始讨论是否需要将利率下调到足以开始刺激经济的程度，从而结束多年来的经济限制。【原文：European Central Bank policymakers have begun to debate whether interest rates need to be lowered enough to start stimulating the economy, ending years of economic restriction, conversations this week with half a dozen sources indicate.】

item.title: 中国智库建议设立 2,800 亿美元股市稳定基金
item.description: 据《21世纪经济报道》周三报道，一家中国政策智库呼吁中国政府发行2万亿元人民币（合2800亿美元）特别国债，以建立股市稳定基金。【原文：A Chinese policy think tank has called for Beijing to issue 2 trillion yuan ($280 billion) of special treasury bonds to set up a stock market stabilisation fund, the 21st Century Business Herald reported on Wednesday.】

item.title: 服装零售商 Shein 与墨西哥金融科技公司 Stori 合作推出信用卡
item.description: 中国快速时尚巨头申银万国通过与墨西哥金融科技公司 Stori 合作，将在全球推出其首张品牌信用卡，两家公司周二表示，这将有助于双方在拉丁美洲第二大经济体拓展业务。【原文：Chinese fast-fashion giant Shein is launching its first branded credit card worldwide through a partnership with Mexican fintech Stori, the firms said on Tuesday, touting synergies that should help both expand in Latin America's second-largest economy.】

item.title: 星巴克咖啡师和顾客向新任首席执行官发出了一个信息：改变！
item.description: 星巴克新任首席执行官布莱恩-尼科尔（Brian Niccol）的工作可谓任重而道远。【原文：Starbucks' new CEO Brian Niccol has his work cut out for him.】

item.title: 交易员权衡美国利率和大选，股市下跌，美元和黄金上涨
item.description: 周三，金价跃升至历史新高，美元再次上扬，使日元和欧元继续承压，而亚洲股市则因投资者在竞争激烈的美国大选前不愿下大赌注而陷入困境。【原文：Gold prices jumped to record high and the dollar was on the rise again on Wednesday, keeping the pressure on the yen and the euro, while stocks in Asia stuttered as investors were reluctant to place major bets ahead of a hotly contested U.S. election.】

item.title: 苹果公司首席执行官蒂姆-库克在北京会见中国工业和信息化部部长
item.description: 根据中国工业和信息化部的声明，苹果公司首席执行官蒂姆-库克周三在北京会见了中国工业和信息化部部长金壮龙。【原文：Apple CEO Tim Cook met with China's minister for industry and information technology, Jin Zhuanglong, on Wednesday in Beijing, according to a statement from his ministry.】

item.title: 美联储前景推动美元升至两个半月高位；日元承压
item.description: 美元周三徘徊在 2 个半月高位，原因是投资者调整了对逐步降息的押注，同时密切关注总统大选选情。【原文：The U.S. dollar hovered at a 2-1/2-month peak on Wednesday as investors adjusted bets toward a gradual reduction of interest rates while keeping an eye on a close presidential election race.】
